playlist.description: Convert a Google Play Music Playlist CSV directory to a single Soundizz compatible CSV file.

args.name: Playlist
args.description: Directory containing a subdirectory 'Tracks' containing CSV files exported from Google Play Music.

args.name: Output
args.description: Directory to output the single, Soundizz compatible CSV file to.

args.name: File
args.description: Name of the file to generate output too.
